609.title: The terms are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read
tosdr.tldr: SoundCloud provides an index describing what each section is about. Thus, you can easily identify which sections you care about and jump directly to these sections.

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
tosdr.tldr: “this Agreement is subject to the laws of the Federal Republic of Germany, excluding the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods (CISG) and excluding the principles of conflict of laws (international private law); and you hereby agree, and SoundCloud agrees, to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Berlin, Germany for resolution of any dispute, action or proceeding arising in connection with this Agreement.”

911.title: Collected personal data used for limited purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
tosdr.tldr: SoundCloud collects data that you provide, but also automatically. Information collected about you is only used for a list of purposes which are reasonable. Your data is not shared with any third-party, except for the features you use.

947.title: Use of cookies and third-party cookies (opt-out)

tosdr.case: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions
tosdr.tldr: SoundCloud uses persistant cookies. They also have a limited set of third-party cookies: Google Analytics, Quantcast and ATInternet. Detailed information about how to opt-out is provided.

tosdr.case: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
tosdr.tldr: You do not have to provide your legal name (except for paid accounts for billing purposes) and you can use the service with a pseudonym.

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
tosdr.tldr: In order to terminate your agreement to the terms, you need to send a written notice to SoundCloud, Berlin. All your content and your activity will be “irretrievably deleted by SoundCloud, except to the extent that we are obliged or permitted to retain such content, data or information for a certain period of time in accordance with applicable laws and regulations and/or to protect our legitimate business interests”. You should back up your tracks yourself.
